author: Jay Peters
title: Twitter will remove misleading COVID-19-related tweets that could incite people to engage in ‘harmful activity’
description: Twitter has updated its COVID-19 policies to say it will require users to remove tweets making unverified claims that “incite people to action and cause widespread panic, social unrest or large-scale disorder.” The changes come as COVID-19 misinformation has …
content:
Twitter has removed over 2,230 misleading tweets in the last month
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Twitter has updated its COVID-19 policies to require users remove tweets making unverified claims that incite people to action and cause widespread pa… [+2015 chars]
